about.feature2Desc: Explore diverse cuisines from Korea, Japan, Spain, Italy, and more
about.feature3Desc: Get detailed nutrition information for every recipe to plan healthy meals

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using Food Trip, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.section2Content: Permission is granted to temporarily use Food Trip for personal, non-commercial purposes. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
terms.section3Content: All recipes are generated by AI and provided for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or safety of the recipes. Users are responsible for verifying ingredients and cooking methods.
terms.section4Content: You are responsible for your use of the service and any content you provide. You must follow all applicable laws and regulations when using our service.
terms.section5Content: Food Trip and its AI-generated recipes are provided 'as is' without any warranties. We are not responsible for any allergic reactions, food poisoning, or other adverse effects from using our recipes.
terms.section6Content: In no event shall Food Trip be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use our service.
terms.section7Content: Food Trip reserves the right to revise these terms at any time. By continuing to use the service, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide when using our service, including ingredients, dietary preferences, and saved recipes. We also collect usage data such as pages visited and features used.
privacy.section2Content: We use your information to provide and improve our AI recipe generation service, personalize your experience, and maintain the security of our platform.
privacy.section3Content: Your data is securely stored using Supabase infrastructure with industry-standard encryption and security measures.
privacy.section4Content: We use OpenAI for recipe generation and Supabase for data storage. These services have their own privacy policies that govern their use of your information.
privacy.section5Content: We use cookies to enhance your experience and remember your preferences, including language settings.
privacy.section6Content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We only share data with service providers necessary to operate our platform.
privacy.section7Content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data. Contact us if you wish to exercise these rights.
privacy.section8Content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.message: For any inquiries, suggestions, or support requests, please feel free to reach out to us via email.
contact.note: We typically respond within about a week.
contact.tip1Desc: Please include details about your inquiry for a faster response.
contact.tip2Desc: If reporting an issue, screenshots help us understand the problem better.
contact.tip3Desc: We love hearing your suggestions for improving Food Trip!
